name: Suhua Group
description: Suhua Group is a leading manufacturer and supplier in the textile and apparel industry, specializing in high-quality fabrics and garments. Established in 1995 and headquartered in Shanghai, China, Suhua Group has built a reputation for innovation and sustainability in its production processes. The company offers a diverse range of products, including woven, knitted, and specialty fabrics, serving various sectors such as fashion, sportswear, and outdoor apparel. With a commitment to environmental stewardship, Suhua employs advanced technologies to minimize waste and reduce its carbon footprint, making significant strides toward sustainable manufacturing. The company collaborates with renowned fashion brands globally, providing tailored solutions that meet the evolving demands of the market. Suhua Group is dedicated to maintaining high standards of quality and customer service, ensuring that its clients receive not only superior products but also exceptional support. As the textile industry continues to evolve, Suhua Group actively invests in research and development to innovate new materials and stay ahead of trends, solidifying its position as a key player in the global marketplace.

seo.meta_title: Suhua Group | Leading Textile and Apparel Manufacturer
seo.meta_description: Learn about Suhua Group, a leading manufacturer in the textile and apparel industry, known for innovative and sustainable fabric solutions.

faq.question: What does Suhua Group specialize in?
faq.answer: Suhua Group specializes in manufacturing high-quality fabrics and apparel.

faq.question: Where is Suhua Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Suhua Group is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

faq.question: What types of products does Suhua Group offer?
faq.answer: Suhua Group offers woven, knitted, and specialty fabrics, as well as sportswear and outdoor apparel.
